thread.title: Manasi Parekh and Manjari Fadnnis bond over music
thread.title_full: Manasi Parekh and Manjari Fadnnis bond over music - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Manasi Parekh and Manjari Fadnnis bond over music
text:
In an industry where friends are few and rivals plenty, two actresses who continue to maintain a strong bond are Manasi Parekh and Manjari Fadnnis .

Manasi Parekh and Manjari Fadnnis 
They have been friends for 10 years — ever since they met on the sets of a reality show. Recently, Manjari dropped in on the set of Manasi’s small screen show, Sumit Sambhal Lega, to surprise her. After the shoot wrapped up, they headed for a quick bite and spent the night karaoking.
I hear the two girls love to croon.
